flawed_nl_solution:
Jill made one and a half times as many coconut candles as almond candles, so she made 10 * 3/2 = 20/3 coconut candles.
She made twice as many lavender candles as coconut candles, so she made 2 * 20/3 = <<2*20/3=40/3>>40/3 lavender candles.
#### 40/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 20/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
